author: David Garc√≠a de Lomana
title: Carteles de ‚Äòs√≥lo s√≠ es s√≠‚Äô en un prost√≠bulo de El Ejido con mujeres explotadas y rituales esot√©ricos
text:
Carteles de ‚Äòs√≥lo s√≠ es s√≠‚Äô en un prost√≠bulo de El Ejido con mujeres explotadas y rituales esot√©ricos
Vigiladas las 24 horas, estaban sometidas a un estricto control y los clientes pod√≠an usarlas como "esclavas sexuales"
La Polic√≠a ha detenido a la pareja que regentaba la casa-burdel
Un
cham√°n, mujeres obligadas a ejercer la prostituci√≥n, rituales esot√©ricos y carteles del s√≥lo s√≠ es s√≠ en las puertas. Es el escenario que se encontr√≥ la Polic√≠a Nacional en un prost√≠bulo de El Ejido (Almer√≠a) regentado por una pareja, detenida por presuntos delitos de explotaci√≥n sexual y contra los derechos de los ciudadanos extranjeros.
Los arrestados forzaban a mujeres en situaci√≥n de ¬´especial vulnerabilidad¬ª a ejercer la prostituci√≥n en condiciones ¬´infrahumanas¬ª y bajo un estricto r√©gimen de reglas y control exhaustivo.
El hombre, de nacionalidad cubana, era el presunto encargado de captar a las trabajadoras. Buscaba inmigrantes que residieran en Espa√±a de manera irregular y se hac√≠a pasar por una especie de cham√°n, ¬´amenaz√°ndolas con rituales esot√©ricos que les provocar√≠an el mal¬ª tanto a ellas como a sus familiares.
Su mujer era la encargada de gestionar la ¬´rutina¬ª del prost√≠bulo y somet√≠a a las v√≠ctimas a un f√©rreo ¬´control¬ª, dando a las trabajadoras instrucciones precisas sobre lo que ten√≠an que decir a la Polic√≠a Nacional en caso de una inspecci√≥n. Adem√°s, y seg√∫n recoge la investigaci√≥n, coloc√≥ en las puertas de la casa-burdel carteles de sensibilizaci√≥n institucional con el eslogan s√≥lo s√≠ es s√≠, en alusi√≥n a la ley impulsada por el Ministerio de Igualdad de
Irene Montero.
Las mujeres denunciaron que la detenida las controlaba las 24 horas del d√≠a a trav√©s de un circuito cerrado de televisi√≥n y utilizaba el audio del sistema para darles instrucciones, incluso cuando √©sta se hallaba fuera del local. Las 13 chicas que llegaron a ejercer la prostituci√≥n en la casa se turnaban para dormir en un par de sof√°s, ya que las habitaciones se reservaban para dar servicio a los clientes.
Presiones, multas y drogas
Seg√∫n explicaron las v√≠ctimas, recib√≠an presiones constantes a trav√©s de un sistema de multas para ¬´no parar de realizar sus servicios sexuales¬ª: deb√≠an estar disponibles todos los d√≠as del a√±o, a cualquier hora del d√≠a o de la noche, y no pod√≠an decidir por ellas mismas si aceptaban o no a los clientes. Tampoco pod√≠an rechazar ninguna de las pr√°cticas sexuales que estos les propon√≠an, incluyendo el sexo sin medidas de protecci√≥n, y si el cliente les ofrec√≠a sustancias estupefacientes, deb√≠an aceptar ¬´para complacerles¬ª.
Asimismo, las trabajadoras relataron a los investigadores que en caso de negarse o superar el tiempo fijado para el servicio, ¬´perd√≠an su recaudaci√≥n¬ª y pod√≠an ser ¬´expulsadas de la casa¬ª, empujadas a ¬´subsistir sin ning√∫n recurso¬ª.
En los registros, la Polic√≠a Nacional hizo acopio de cuadernos de cuentas donde quedaba acreditado que la detenida se quedaba con cantidades que oscilaban entre ¬´el 40 y el 50% de los servicios¬ª. Adem√°s, restaba del dinero final los gastos en higiene, alimentos, consumiciones o preservativos, ¬´llegando incluso a extender pr√©stamos con intereses que rozaban la usura¬ª.
Una de las v√≠ctimas declar√≥ que aguantaba esta situaci√≥n ¬´con tal de no volver a su pa√≠s¬ª, donde era perseguida por raz√≥n de su orientaci√≥n sexual, mientras que otras estaban ¬´tan desesperadas que se planteaban aceptar ofertas de sus clientes¬ª, quienes les proporcionaban alojamiento ¬´a cambio de convertirse en sus esclavas sexuales¬ª.
Detenidas 2 personas en
[#ElEjido]( [#Almer√≠a]) acusadas de cometer [#delitos]relativos a la prostituci√≥n y delitos contra los derechos de los ciudadanos extranjeros
üëâüèªUno de los arrestados se hac√≠a pasar por
[#cham√°n]para captar v√≠ctimas y las coaccionaba con rituales esot√©ricos [pic.twitter.com/fx6kOQMAlB]
‚Äî Polic√≠a Nacional (@policia)
[February 22, 2024]
La operaci√≥n Zodiaco concluy√≥ con la detenci√≥n de los dos responsables del burdel por presuntos delitos de explotaci√≥n sexual y contra los derechos de los ciudadanos extranjeros, adem√°s del cese de la actividad del prost√≠bulo, mientras que las mujeres liberadas fueron derivadas a los distintos servicios de protecci√≥n institucional.

author: LISA LANDRAM Daily News-Record
title: Crash In Rockingham Monday Results In Fatality | Harrisonburg | dnronline.com
text:
On Monday at 12:12 p.m. in Rockingham County a fatal crash occurred.
The incident occurred on Route 11, N. Valley Pike, north of Route 720, Smithland Road and the Virginia State Police are investigating the two-vehicle fatal crash, according to a news release by the Virginia State Police.
‚ÄúA 2015 Subaru Legacy was traveling north on Route 11 when it crossed the centerline and collided head-on with a southbound 2004 GMC Envoy,‚Äù stated the news release.
The impact of the collision resulted in both vehicles running off the road.
According to the VSP, the driver of the Subaru was not wearing their seatbelt and was therefore ejected from the vehicle during the crash. The driver of the Subaru is Garcia F. Hernandez, 22, of Rockingham.
Hernandez was transported to Sentara RMH Medical Center with life-threatening injuries, where he later succumbed to his injuries, according to VSP.
The driver of the GMC, Jorge A. Castaneda-Rosales, 24, of Timberville, was wearing his seatbelt and transferred to Sentara RMH Medical Center with minor injuries.
There was an adult female passenger in the GMC, who also wearing a seatbelt and transferred to Sentara RMH Medical Center for treatment for minor injuries.
The crash remains under investigation, according to VSP.

author: The Straits Times
title: At least 29 students killed in stampede in Central African Republic, sources say
text:
BANGUI - At least 29 students were killed when an electrical explosion triggered panic and a stampede at a high school in Central African Republic's capital on Wednesday, two hospital sources said.
The disaster happened as over 5,000 students from six other schools were taking their final exams at the examination centre located in Barthelemy Boganda high school in Bangui, the Education Ministry said.
A hospital source told Reuters that 29 people were killed and 260 injured.
"We were really overwhelmed. It was terrible. Dozens of victims were arriving," the source said, recalling the stress his team felt.
Another medical source, who put the death toll at 31, said the sound of the explosion made students think the building was going to collapse.
"There was panic and some of the students jumped from the first floor," he told Reuters, adding that the test takers were roughly 18-22 years old.
The Education Ministry said in a statement that a transformer located in the main building of the school exploded after a team from the country's main utility ENERCA restored electricity.
The statement also said the incident resulted in "a number of serious injuries, unfortunately including some fatalities".
The ministry said it would look into how the incident took place and promised to ensure a smooth continuation of the examination session. REUTERS
Join ST's Telegram channel and get the latest breaking news delivered to you.

author: Esther Kang
title: Andre Braugher's 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine' Costars Reunites to Honor Him
text: Entertainment TV Andre Braugher's Brooklyn Nine-Nine Family Reunites to Honor Him: 'We Laughed. We Cried a Little. We Reminisced' In December, PEOPLE confirmed that Braugher had died after living with lung cancer By Esther Kang Esther Kang Esther Kang is a writer at PEOPLE. She has been working at PEOPLE since 2023 and has previously worked for publications like TMZ and TooFab. People Editorial Guidelines Published on March 14, 2024 06:38PM EDT The cast of 'Brooklyn 9-9' reunite to honor Andre Braugher. Photo: Melissa Fumero/Instagram Andre Braugher's Brooklyn Nine-Nine costars have reunited to honor the late actor's memory and the impact he had on their lives. In a joint post shared to Instagram by Terry Crews and Melissa Fumero, the cast was pictured smiling shoulder-to-shoulder after sharing a meal together. Andy Samberg, Chelsea Peretti, Joe Lo Truglio, Stephanie Beatriz, Joel McKinnon Miller and Dirk Blocker were among the cast present at the reunion. "Could not have described last night any better‚Ä¶!" Crews wrote in the caption, adding the series' beloved group catchphrase, "NINE-NINE." "We laughed. We cried a little. We reminisced. We laughed some more. Nine Nine Forever," he concluded. Andre Braugher on 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine'. John P. Fleenor/NBC/NBCU Photo Bank via Getty Brooklyn Nine-Nine Cast Pays Tribute to Andre Braugher After His Death: ‚ÄòO Captain. My Captain‚Äô In December, PEOPLE confirmed that Braugher died of lung cancer. He was 61. The late actor was best known for his role as Det. Frank Pemberton in Homicide: Life on the Street for which he won an Emmy Award in 1998. He was also famous for portraying the no-nonsense Capt. Raymond Holt in Brooklyn Nine-Nine and picked up four Emmy nominations in the course of its run. In total, he earned 11 Emmy nominations in his career, including a second win for the 2006 miniseries Thief. At the time of his death, Braugher's Brooklyn Nine-Nine costars honored his legacy in various statements shared to their respective Instagram accounts. Remembering Andre Braugher's Life Through His Most Iconic Roles Andre Braugher and Terry Crews on 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine'. FOX Image Collection via Getty Crews, who who played Terry Jeffords, was among the first to pay tribute to Braugher on social media, saying he couldn‚Äôt believe the actor was ‚Äúgone so soon.‚Äù ‚ÄúI‚Äôm honored to have known you, laughed with you, worked with you and shared 8 glorious years watching your irreplaceable talent. This hurts. You left us too soon," he wrote on Instagram. The 55-year-old then praised Braugher for teaching him "so much" and expressed that he was "grateful for the experience of knowing you." "Thank you for your wisdom, your advice, your kindness and your friendship. Deepest condolences to your wife and family in this difficult time. You showed me what a life well lived looks like," he added. Brooklyn Nine-Nine's Chelsea Peretti Recalls 'Nightmare' Moment She Broke Down Over Andre Braugher's Death Andre Braugher and Joe Lo Truglio on 'Brooklyn Nine-Nine'. John P. Fleenor/FOX/Universal Television/NBCU Photo Bank/NBCUniversal via Getty Lo Truglio also shared some of his favorite memories working with Braugher in a statement of his own. ‚ÄúSo many wonderful stories will be told about Andre but for now, all my love goes to his wife Ami and his three boys, who he loved very much and flew back every weekend from the show to be with," he wrote alongside a photo of Braugher laughing. Never miss a story ‚Äî sign up for PEOPLE's free daily newsletter to stay up-to-date on the best of what PEOPLE has to offer, from celebrity news to compelling human interest stories. "We all know how powerful an actor he was, but even more, Andre knew exactly well his most important role and was deeply proud of it," he added. "He spoke often about his sons, and knew how lucky he was to have Ami. I‚Äôm grateful to them for allowing us to share eight years with him.‚Äù ‚ÄúI miss him so much already,‚Äù He concluded his post. ‚ÄúWhat an honor to work with a man who knew what it was really all about. I feel blessed and thankful. Miss you Capt Holt. Love, Porkchop.üíî.‚Äù

author: Laura Mckenna
title: 'Loveliest village in Britain' with sandy beaches and crystal clear water - Nottinghamshire Live
text: Tucked away on the coastline of Cornwall, just three miles west of Penzance, is the picturesque village and fishing port called Mousehole, a dreamy Cornish haven for anyone seeking quaint charm. With cobbled streets decked with traditional stone cottages, Mousehole's labyrinth of art galleries, unique boutiques and eateries all lead to an opportunity to perch by the water's edge, observing the calming rhythm of the tide. This once thriving pilchard port - known as "Mowzel," not "mouse hole" - also boasts pebbled and sandy beaches within the harbour, its waters glistening clear. A year-round dog ban ensures its popularity among families with young ones who often engage in crabbing along the crystal-clear shorelines while adults soak up the serene view. As per the Daily Mail, it's "like being in a postcard". [Get the latest What's On news straight to your phone by joining us on WhatsApp](https://www.nottinghampost.com/news/nottingham-news/latest-whats-nottingham-news-updates-9002777) This tranquil village, which traces its roots back to the 1300s, served as a significant harbour and the major port for Mount's Bay. History will tell you that it was no stranger to conflict during the Spanish invasions of the 16th century when soldiers descended upon the coastal area amid historical tensions between the two nations. Visitors flock to Mousehole, drawn by the charm of its traditional life. Here they can sip on local craft beers, explore independent art galleries or enjoy a brisk swim in the natural tidal pool, reports [the Mirror](https://www.mirror.co.uk/travel/uk-ireland/cutest-fishing-village-like-being-33174958). Echoing the sentiments of famed Welsh poet Dylan Thomas, many assert it's the "loveliest village in Britain", spellbound by picturesque harbour views and the offered artisan foods at places like Mousehole Deli and Kitchen or Tremayne Tea Room. Nestled at the focal point of the village is The Ship Inn, where diners are presented with seafood fare such as scampi and chips or rump steak, topped off with tempting sticky toffee pudding. Commended with a TripAdvisor Travellers Award, The Ship Inn boasts four out of five stars for its harbourside location and mouthwatering, generous meals. Promoting an effervescent and cosmopolitan ambiance, 2 Fore Street offers diners relaxed bistro-style dining,facing Mount's Bay. Visitors tend to opt for their hand-picked crab salad or grilled lemon sole fillets accompanied by samphire, enhanced by a glass of crisp prosecco. This establishment certainly makes the list of must-visit eateries for anyone visiting Mousehole. The village is adorned with [Christmas](https://www.nottinghampost.com/all-about/christmas) lights out of season, as part of an annual tradition that coincides with Tom Bawcocks Eve on December 23rd, when the famous Star Gazy Pie is prepared. The lights are respectfully switched off on December 19th in memory of the local lifeboat men who tragically lost their lives in the 1981 Penlee disaster. Despite the traditional cottages standing proudly by the sea for many years, the accommodation available in the village is far from old-fashioned or outdated. Beach Retreats offers a range of properties throughout Mousehole and beyond, boasting interiors worthy of a magazine feature set against idyllic backdrops. Whether you're looking to escape the daily grind and relax on Harbour Beach, or explore hidden gems within the winding streets, there's no denying that Mousehole is one of the most charming villages in the West Country, deserving of a visit at any time of year.

author: Sergio Barbosa
title: La Procuradur√≠a le pide a la JEP dejar en libertad condicional al general (r) Mauricio Santoyo - BluRadio
text: La Procuradur√≠a General de la Naci√≥n le hizo la petici√≥n a la Jurisdicci√≥n Especial para la Paz, JEP, para que deje en libertad al general (r) [Mauricio Santoyo](https://www.bluradio.com/nacion/paz/dura-advertencia-de-la-jep-exgeneral-mauricio-santoyo-lo-expulsara-cb20), porque seg√∫n el Ministerio P√∫blico cumpli√≥ con los cinco a√±os m√≠nimo privado de la libertad que ordena la ley en el caso de los integrantes de la Fuerza P√∫blica. La JEP abord√≥ el caso de Santoyo para determinar si cumple los requisitos necesarios para recibir beneficios de libertad transitoria, condicionada y anticipada, sin embargo, la JEP ha se√±alado que Santoyo no ha aportado suficiente verdad sobre su participaci√≥n en los hechos por los cuales se le investiga, lo que ha complicado su situaci√≥n legal en el pa√≠s. ‚ÄúEl problema jur√≠dico que abord√≥ la resoluci√≥n apelada se redujo a determinar si el compareciente re√∫ne los requisitos para otorgarle el beneficio de LTCA. Con tal prop√≥sito, expuso los requisitos legales que deben acreditarse para gozar el citado beneficio. Indic√≥ que otorgar la LTCA constituye una ‚Äúmedida de confianza, sin que ello implique definir la situaci√≥n jur√≠dica del compareciente‚Äù, se√±ala el documento emitido por la Procuradur√≠a. En este documento, tambi√©n se afirma que durante una audiencia de aporte de verdad realizada el 21 de marzo de 2024, Santoyo mantuvo su postura de negar cualquier responsabilidad en los delitos investigados, afirmando que no recuerda los hechos o que no particip√≥ en ellos, actitud criticada por la [JEP,](https://www.bluradio.com/nacion/paz/jep-cita-a-exgobernadores-de-narino-para-declarar-por-fumigacion-de-cultivos-ilicitos-cb20) que considera necesario que el compareciente contribuya de manera significativa a la construcci√≥n de la verdad y la memoria hist√≥rica del conflicto armado en Colombia.

author: Redacci√≥n digital Noticias Cuatro
title: Marta, una mujer que cumpli√≥ su sue√±o pese a su diagn√≥stico del P√°rkinson
text: Cumplir un sue√±o con un diagn√≥stico de P√°rkinson a los 32 a√±os: "He sufrido mucho psicol√≥gicamente" A Marta le aparecieron los s√≠ntomas hace 11 a√±os pero los ocult√≥ por verg√ºenza Marta necesit√≥ bastante tiempo para darse cuenta de que ocultar la enfermedad no era la soluci√≥n Los temblores, los espasmos y la rigidez se convirtieron en parte de su d√≠a a d√≠a A Marta le diagnosticaron P√°rkinson con tan solo 32 a√±os. Ella cuenta su historia desde una sala de fisioterapia donde los pacientes son mayores de 60. ‚ÄúHe sufrido psicol√≥gicamente mucho‚Äù, confiesa. Y es que esta enfermedad tambi√©n [puede afectar a personas j√≥venes](https://www.cuatro.com/noticias/sociedad/20240411/triplicaran-casos-parkinson-enfermedad-personas-jovenes_18_012202891.html), seg√∫n informa en el v√≠deo Lorelei Esteban. Gracias a los avances de la medicina, pudo cumplir su sue√±o: ser madre. ‚ÄúEra muy raro ver a una mujer joven con P√°rkinson‚Äù, reconoce Marta. Ella ahora tiene 43, pero los s√≠ntomas comenzaron hace 11 a√±os. ‚ÄúHab√≠a s√≠ntomas que yo no los asociaba como dormir poco, estar muy cansada y las p√©rdidas de memoria‚Äù, a√±ade en el D√≠a Mundial de esta enfermedad. M√ÅS [Sanidad pone el foco en las pseudoterapias: publica un listado de cu√°les tienen base cient√≠fica y cu√°les no](/noticias/sociedad/20240411/sanidad-cuestiona-pseudoterapias-eficacia-riesgos-salud_18_012202354.html#utm_source=apoyo_editorial_articulo) [T√°peres comestibles o que alargan la vida de la fruta: el futuro de los envases sostenibles](/noticias/sociedad/20240411/meetingpack-2024-envases-sostenibles-teperes-comestibles_18_012201649.html#utm_source=apoyo_editorial_articulo) [Las temperaturas en Espa√±a pueden alcanzar los 40 grados en pleno abril: miramos al mar para encontrar la causa](/noticias/sociedad/20240411/temperaturas-40-grados-primavera-causas-mar_18_012198534.html#utm_source=apoyo_editorial_articulo) ‚ÄúYo no quer√≠a reconocerlo‚Äù, indica Marta sobre su enfermedad La vida de Marta dio un giro cuando le lleg√≥ un diagn√≥stico que le cambi√≥ la vida: ten√≠a P√°rkinson. La noticia le lleg√≥ con tan solo 32 a√±os, un a√±o despu√©s de aparecer los s√≠ntomas. ‚ÄúCuando cog√≠a los cubiertos se mov√≠an mucho y dec√≠a ‚ÄòQu√© raro‚Äô, porque la mano ya era as√≠, luego ya fue con el pie‚Äù, apunta. Los temblores, los espasmos y la rigidez se convirtieron en parte de su rutina durante todo un a√±o entero. Pero decidi√≥ esconderlo porque le daba verg√ºenza. ‚ÄúEra como algo que yo no quer√≠a reconocer‚Äù, destaca. Despu√©s, dej√≥ de poder hacer gestos cotidianos. ‚ÄúLo que es batir un huevo, dar la vuelta a la tortilla, peinarme y hacer la cama es imposible‚Äù, recalca. Marta quiso cumplir su sue√±o pese a su enfermedad A pesar de tener que adaptarse a su nueva vida, Marta no dud√≥ en perseguir su sue√±o de querer ser madre. ‚ÄúFue bastante duro‚Äù, subraya antes de explicar el recorrido tan complicado que tuvo que realizar para conseguir este reto. ‚ÄúSali√≥ un ni√±o san√≠simo, precioso y es lo mejor que me ha pasado‚Äù, dice. Marta necesit√≥ bastante tiempo para darse cuenta de que ocultar la enfermedad no era la soluci√≥n. ‚ÄúHa sido muy dif√≠cil llegar hasta el momento en el que estoy ahora‚Äù, apunta. Un ejemplo de constancia y superaci√≥n que muestran que perseguir los sue√±os y buscar ayuda son dos temas clave para superar nuestros temores.

author: Cond√© Nast
title: Ni anchos ni pitillo: estos son los (poco favorecedores) pantalones que marcar√°n tu vuelta a la oficina | Vogue Espa√±a
text: Para las que vivimos en clave oversize, el retorno de los [pantalones anchos](https://www.vogue.es/moda/articulos/pantalones-ancho-cargo-sustituto-vaqueros-tendencia-primavera-verano-2022) a nuestro armario fue como una especie de milagro divino para desterrar aquellas f√≥rmulas que nos hac√≠an sentir embutidas d√≠a s√≠ y d√≠a tambi√©n. Sin embargo, con los caprichos de la moda, las [tendencias de oto√±o-invierno 2024-2025](https://www.vogue.es/articulos/tendencias-otono-invierno-2024-2025-que-se-lleva) han vuelto a poner en el foco a un archienemigo estil√≠stico que no destaca precisamente por su comodidad. Ni baggy ni [pitillo,](https://www.vogue.es/articulos/pantalones-pitillo-tendencias-primavera-verano-2024) el pantal√≥n cigarette viene a ser ese modelo complicado que promete vestir nuestro regreso a la oficina. ¬øQu√© es exactamente un pantal√≥n cigarette? Esta silueta se define por un patr√≥n recto, ligeramente m√°s entallado en los bajos, que se acomodan justo a la altura del tobillo o un poco por encima de √©l. Tambi√©n pueden ser vaqueros, pero la t√≥nica que encontramos entre las colecciones oto√±ales se declina en clave sastrer√≠a. Khaite, [Carolina Herrera](https://www.vogue.es/moda/modapedia/disenadores/carolina-herrera/8) y Jason Wu optan por versiones en negro combinadas con chaquetas cortas o tops y faldas por encima, un poco en l√≠nea con la microtendencia de los ‚Äò [skousers](https://www.vogue.es/articulos/falda-sobre-pantalon-tendencia-otono-invierno-2024-2025)‚Äô que tanto vimos en la semana de la moda de Copenhague. [Ralph Lauren](https://www.vogue.es/moda/modapedia/marcas/ralph-lauren/152) prefiere darle un giro al traje de chaqueta de toda la vida con este tipo de pantalones m√°s entallados combinados con botines de cordones. [Herm√®s](https://www.vogue.es/moda/modapedia/marcas/hermes/140) propone sacarlo de la paleta crom√°tica m√°s oscura y conjugarlo en clave total look. As√≠ propone estilismos para vestir de rojo de pies a cabeza en los que los pantalones cigarette (m√°s bien de tiro alto) se combinan con tops y chaquetas a tono. La coletilla de ‚Äòpoco favorecedores‚Äô se debe precisamente a que su silueta entallada realza solamente un tipo muy espec√≠fico de silueta, como sucede con los pantalones pitillo. Al ir m√°s pegados, dificulta un poco m√°s la libertad de movimientos frente, por ejemplo, a la comodidad que pueden presentar unos pantalones anchos de sastre. En cualquier caso, el secreto para combinarlos es concebirlos como cualquier otro pantal√≥n de nuestro armario: una camiseta blanca y una cazadora vaquera pueden ser dos buenos aliados, como deja claro aqu√≠ la prescriptora Anne Laure Mais. Eso s√≠, parecen funcionar mejor con zapatos cl√°sicos, como unos salones, unos botines de tac√≥n o unos mules.
